name: Open Balloon Pop
description:
Open Balloon Pop is a fun game  for Linux where your objective is to stop a series of balloons from leaving the screen. Seems simple enough right?

Different colored balloons have various points maximizing your score. Simply move your mouse over them and watch them pop revealing various goodies.

Tip: Get as much extra lives as you can as they will be essential as the game advance.

This game was written and developed using ENIGMA, the 2D Game Development Software for creating apps in LINUX. Check out its website at

http://www.enigma-dev.org
